channel.title: What concerts have you been to? Who have you seen?
channel.description:
Just post who you've seen live ;)
Anyone at t4 on the beach 2006/2008 and some 2009 (i sneak in, or go to the beach and watch as i live in weston-super-mare)
Ill start: You Me At Six (5 Times) Angels and Airwaves James Taylor Emarosa The Spill Canvas The Friday Night Boys The Audition (3 Times) All Time Low (4 Times) The Wurzles Attack Attack! The Blackout (4 Times) Young Guns (2 Times) My Passion Newton Faulkner Charlie Winston Forever The Sickest Kids (5 Times) We The Kings Twenty Twenty Show It Off Go-X The Following Announcement Mumford & Sons Johnny And The Atlas Bowling For Soup A The Dollyrots We Are The Ocean Canterbury (3 Times) Page 44 Glamour Of The Kill Decade Action Item Bob Slayer Steve-0 T4 On The Beach 2006 Yellow Card We Are The In Crowd The Maine New Found Glory Let Live While She Sleeps Kids In Glass Houss (4 Times) The Skints (2 Times) Mayday Parade (3 Times) Boys Like Girls Cartel (2 Times) The Story So Far Charlie Simpson Of Mice & Men Hit The Lights (2 Times) Taking Back Sunday (2 Times) Lower Than Atlantis (2 Times) Set Your Goals Funeral For A Friend It Boys (2 Times) Architects Loads more from Slam Dunk 2012 Leeds and Hatfield... The All American Reject (2 times if you include T4 on the beach -.-) Blink 182 (My life has now been made)

item.title: What concerts have you been to? Who have you seen?
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

Got tickets for blink 182, you me at six and four year strong in july

I saw All Time Low (again) Young Guns (again) and Yellowcard on Saturday

I have added a few to my list! On Friday I saw Steve-O from Jackass with Bob Slayer supporting!

Read full topic

item.title: What concerts have you been to? Who have you seen?
item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

The Black Dahlia Murder (SICK show)
Augury
Hatesphere
Despised Icon (They were insane on stage, hung out with alex after the show.)
Winds of Plague (SIIIICK show)
U2 (First concert =p)
Epicurean (Insanely good symphonic metal)

Going to see:
may 17:
Job for a Cowboy (New stuff is too plain =)
White Chapel (SUUUUUUPER EXCITED)
Cattle Decapitation (We’ll see.)

Anything else was either not good enough to remember, or local bands.

item.title: What concerts have you been to? Who have you seen?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Time for an update since I’ve been to Roadburn:
Cynic 2x
Pontiak
Graspop Metal Meeting
Local festival with Within Temptation
Cky
Colour Haze
Earthless 3x, seen them twice during Roadburn
Oresund Space Collective, great improvised stoner rock!
Sons of Otis
Monkey3
Goatsnake
Church of Misery
Suma
Thorr’s Hammer, Only saw a part of it due to a collision in the timetable with:
Comus, Really epic acid folk, check them out
Long distance calling
Karma to Burn
Astra, Great prog rock
Fatso Jetson
Brant Bjork
Garcia Plays Kyuss (!)

Read full topic

item.title: What concerts have you been to? Who have you seen?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

omg I found the one I was at, Parachute 2010 was mean

oh yeah. and we bought some t-shirts that glow when it hears music.
some dude got his teeth knocked out in the mosh pit, got back up and bolted it

this part everyone was getting hit by the glow sticks but who gives?

this is basicly everywhere we went

btw we camped there for 3 days

some dudes random tent


we walked around with pink coats on

rapture ruckuss
underoath
switchfoot
parachute band
new world son
family force 5

item.title: What concerts have you been to? Who have you seen?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Going to Roadburn in April, one of the biggest stoner/doom festivals.
Can’t wait to see Earthless, John Garcia sings Kyuss, Brant Bjork and the Bros, Karma to Burn and Russian Circles. And perhaps some other ones I forgot about.

PS: Colour haze was awesome, very great stoner rock

Read full topic
